name: path_to_sheet
prompt: Please enter the path to the input csv spreadsheet, relative to the current directory ( e.g. testing.csv ).

name: max_guests_per_table
verbose_name: Maximum number of guests per table
prompt: Please specify the maximum number of guests that can sit at a table (default = 10).

name: min_guests_per_table
verbose_name: Minimum number of guests per table
prompt: Please specify the minimum number of guests that can sit at a table (default = 8).

name: weight_partner
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *partner* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for partners to sit together (default = 6000).

name: weight_preferences
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *preferences* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for individual preferences to be taken into account for the seating arrangement (default = 800).

name: weight_dislikes
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *dislikes* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for individual dislikes to be taken into account for the seating arrangement (default = -1200).

name: weight_languages
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *languages* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for people sitting together to speak the same language (default = 500)

name: weight_age
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *age* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for people sitting together to have a small age difference (default = -300)

name: weight_city
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *city* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for people sitting together to live in the same city (default = 50)

name: weight_interests
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *interests* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for people sitting together to have some shared interests (default = 100)

name: weight_lastName
prompt: Please provide the weight for the *lastName* parameter. This should reflect how important it is for people sitting together to have the same last name (correlating with family relations, default = 20)

name: num_iterations
verbose_name: Number of solutions for the Greedy Heuristic Algorithm
prompt: Please choose the number of solutions to explore for the Greedy Heuristic Algorithm (default = automatic).
